channel.title: PI make all 99s on start
channel.description: how do i make a starter when the person starts all his skills are 99??

item.title: PI make all 99s on start
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I Vain I:

Or, you can open Player class and just set all the skills equal to 99, and the experience to 13.5M

Read full topic

item.title: PI make all 99s on start
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=480928.msg3521506#msg3521506 date=1299437900]
You do for a fact put it under the starter pack.
[/quote]Actually, it can go anywhere if he encloses it in a method and calls the method correctly.[/quote]Thats true… i coded a source for a friend off iHybrid and it had it under the starter pack void. I guess any place works though.

Read full topic

item.title: PI make all 99s on start
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

in playerassistant seach for something like [code] public void addStarter() {
c.trade11 = 1200;
//ATTACK
c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5;
c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(0);
//DEFENCE
c.playerXP[1] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5;
c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(1);
//STRENGTH
c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5;
c.playerLevel[2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(2);
//HITPOINTS
c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
//RANGE
c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5;
c.playerLevel[4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(4);
//PRAYER
c.playerXP[5] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5;
c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
//MAGIC
c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5;
c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(6);

		c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000);
		c.getItems().addItem(2503, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(1127, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(5698, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(10828, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2497, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(1079, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(4587, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(9185, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(9243, 100);
		c.getItems().addItem(1712, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(1725, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(4675, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(4091, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(4093, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(3842, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(4675, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(3842, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(386, 200);
		c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(9075, 50);
		c.getItems().addItem(557, 200);
		c.getItems().addItem(555, 300);
		c.getItems().addItem(560, 220);
		c.getItems().addItem(565, 100);
		c.sendMessage("If you drop an item it will disappear for ever!");
		c.sendMessage("Also you wont lose any items from dying within 15 minutes.");
		c.getPA().showInterface(3559);
		c.canChangeAppearance = true;
	}
[/code]

and remove //ATTACK c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5; c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); //DEFENCE c.playerXP[1] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5; c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); //STRENGTH c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5; c.playerLevel[2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); //HITPOINTS c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); //RANGE c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5; c.playerLevel[4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); //PRAYER c.playerXP[5] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5; c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); //MAGIC c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99) + 5; c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(6);

item.title: PI make all 99s on start
item.dc:creator: @fmcb fmcb
item.description:
@fmcb wrote:

Ctrl+F - Starter=0

for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); }

I think that would do it

Read full topic
